participant_1.background:
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I like to stay active and go to the gym 3-4 times a week.
i graduated high school.
my favorite type of music is metal.

participant_2.background:
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.
my mother does not ! ove me.
my father used to be a cop.
I work hard and save money for my future.
I have to balance my work and studies, and it can be very challenging.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.
That's really sweet. I like to make short films with my camcorder. What do you like to do with your family?
I love going to the zoo with my sister. It's a lot of fun.
That sounds really nice. I have never been to the zoo before.
You should go sometime! It's a really great experience.
I will definitely look into it. What else do you like to do with your family?
We like to go on hikes and play games together.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I am glad that you have a good relationship with your family.
Thank you. I am too. They are really important to me.
I am happy to hear that. Do you have any other interests?
Yes, I work hard and save money for my future. I am also studying to become a nurse.
That's really great. I am sure you will be a great nurse.
What do you like about nursing?
I like helping people and making a difference in the world.
That's a great reason to become a nurse. I am sure you will make a great impact on the world.
